other_tests.procedure_name: CT ABDOMEN AND PELVIS WITH CONTRAST
other_tests.findings: Small amount of free fluid within the pelvis, a 1.3 cm round calcification within the central pelvis with surrounding ill-defined fluid, phlegmonous change, and enhancement suggestive of perforated appendicitis with an appendicolith, and an associated ill-defined fluid collection measuring 3.1 x 4 x 3.9 cm (AP x TV x CC). Air-fluid levels within the small bowel with extensive intraluminal fluid.
